TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SequenceDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support for and all classes that derive from it.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequenceDesigner> provides design-time support for the following classes that derive from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>:
- <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>
- <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>
- <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity>
- <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>
- <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>
- <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SynchronizationScopeActivity>
- <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>
